summary: Most core UI requirements (full-screen dimmed bg, split responsive layout, category list, glassmorphism overlay, vinyl image with play/pause-controlled rotation, and base-path-safe asset URL helper) appear implemented. One exact-text requirement for the tagline does not match the spec. Several unrequested additions (backend/auth/actor/query plumbing and a promotional footer link) were introduced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Tagline text must match exactly: "Not just for a television, Teleport to where it’s written."
missing_requirements.reason: The implemented tagline uses a straight apostrophe ("it's") instead of the required curly apostrophe ("it’s"), so it is not an exact match.
